text: Fatjon Muhameti (born 18 October 1982 in Tiranë) is a former Albanian footballer who played for KF Tirana and KF Gramshi. He now works as an official matchday delegate for the Albanian Football Association.FSHF profileFootballdatabase profile ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Tirana Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Albanian Second Division players Category:Albanian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:KF Tirana players Category:KF Gramshi players
